text: Nest Capital||Nest Capitals are the most common Skaven settlements, offering the most comprehensive building and recruitment options.

Warpstone Mine||Warpstone Mines produce [[img:icon_warpstones]][[/img]] Warpstone and provide unique building and recruitment options. Consuming [[img:icon_warpstones]][[/img]] Warpstone can power certain structures, unlock unique faction technologies, or enhance your units.

Convert to Nest Capital||Nest Capitals are the most common Skaven settlements, offering the most comprehensive building and recruitment options.

Sack and Occupy (Nest Capital)||Gain a substantial income through looting, but damage local buildings and sell all captives into slavery. Local [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} will significantly decrease, and relations with the previous rulers will deteriorate greatly.

Sack and Occupy (Mine)||Gain a substantial income through looting, but damage local buildings and sell all captives into slavery. Local [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} will significantly decrease, and relations with the previous rulers will deteriorate greatly.
This is a Skaven Warpstone Mine.
The surface dwellers are growing suspicious due to the increasing disappearances, but no one dares to investigate further.
With advanced Warpstone engineering tools, the Skaven can deploy their facilities directly within the planet's crust.
